Title: Von Ryan's Express
Writer: David Westheimer (novel), Wendell Mayes (screenplay), Joseph Landon (screenplay)
Actors: Frank Sinatra, Trevor Howard, Raffaella Carrà, Brad Dexter
Plot: Ryan, an American POW, leads his fellow prisoners on a dangerous escape from the Germans in Italy. Having seemingly made errors of judgment, Ryan has to win the support of the mainly British soldiers he is commanding.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
